lead_paragraph: Dutchman Tom Dumoulin will wear the leader's pink jersey after scoring a home victory in the first stage of the Giro d'Italia at Apeldoorn on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Home Victory for Dutchman Dumoulin in Giro Opener
headline.main: Home Victory for Dutchman Dumoulin in Giro Opener
